conversation.content: I spilled coffee on my phone 2 days ago. I have Premium coverage.

[AGENT THINKING] Liquid accidental damage, recent, Premium likely covered. Need prior claims check.
Calling update_internal_scratchpad({"reasoning":"Premium plan + recent liquid damage.","confidence_level":"high"})
[AGENT ACTION] message_to_user {"message":"Have you filed any other claims in the last 12 months?"}

arguments.reason: Premium plan covers recent accidental liquid damage.

arguments.message: Please provide your name, Contoso ID, phone, and email to finalize your claim.
